replies.body: I had answered all questions last night but I still did not unlock the iron.....How???
hmmmmm Riot!! Where's my icon ?? I already did the quiz {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Rito, help, unable to do quiz :'(

i had this issue too, i fixed it by logging out and then logging back in
then trying the quiz again
it should work if you do that, also the free icon will take 2-3 days to appear in your account
It seems everyone has the Janna icon. <3.. Did anyone get any of the others?
Are these skins permanent to the store??
It says 1RP for the Star Guardian Icon and Ward respectively here. In store, the client says it's 250RP/1500IP for the icon, and 640RP for the ward.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
That's when it is bought in the bundle pack.
I dont think the bundle comes with lux, only the new guardians
